string-array.name: first_page_content
string-array.item: Air will not help you burn calories, began to exercise
The sports meet leave traces of hard on you. Come on!
Movement is a very important appointment, and their own who also can not stop!
Want to better shape, with little move!
An exercise is 25 perspiration plus 75 determination
You are the most attractive sport!
Follow every bits of bit athletic achievements better myself
Fall in love with his efforts to movement
Looking for happiness in the movement.

string-array.name: sleep_page_content
string-array.item: Enough sleep may protect the brain, enhance immunity.
Lateral position make the heart not oppressed, sleep respiration unobstructed, and conducive to the emptying of the stomach.
Guarantee the sleep time of not less than 7 hours a day, not more than 9 hours
1 hour before sleeping to drink 1 cup of milk helps to soothe and improve the quality of sleep
Do not read in bed or watching TV, so as not to affect the bed habit
As far as possible in the evening sleep before 11 clock, help the body metabolism
Try to get up before 7 clock, so conducive to discharge waste
Lack of sleep and sleep quality general lead to increased risk for obesity and type 2 diabetes
Put to help you sleep, aromatherapy has a lot of plants and flowers fragrance can help us relieve nerves, conducive to sleep
Two hours before bed at night to drink a cup of warm milk, may help sleep by way of increased intestinal blood supply
Seven hours sleep helps the brain to strengthen memory
Hot ginger blisters feet, helps to keep out the cold and promote sleep.
Foods are helpful to sleep: milk, wheat, lotus seed, walnut, red dates, longans etc.by, vinegar, sugar, water, etc
Regular exercise habit, can improve the quality of sleep at night.
A hot bath before going to bed will help relax your muscles, can make sleep more sweet.
Walk briskly about 15 ~ 20 minutes before bed, sleeping effect is very significant.
Liver at 11 to at 3 PM activity ability, the strongest and best liver detoxification period, ensure good sleep is protect liver medicine.
Brazil nuts, walnuts, etc are rich in nutrients such as protein, potassium, selenium foods help the body of the synthesis of human natural hormone, hypnosis melatonin.
Kale and spinach contains rich calcium, they can help the body produce natural hormone, hypnosis melatonin.
Chickpeas, shrimp and lobster is a good source of tryptophan, can be converted into serotonin human body, help sleep well.
Lettuce lettuce cream contains mountain, to calm and relax the brain. Can in the boiling water into the pieces of lettuce leaves, make lettuce tea, drink before sleep.
Sunflower can adjust the metabolism of brain cells, power of sleep.
Glycine is contained in chamomile tea, can relax nerves and muscles, as a mild sedative, relieve anxiety.
Before sleeping with hot bubble foot, will lead the blood downward, stability and mind.
Bedtime drink a cup of honey tea can also eliminate the nervous psychology of people, relieve stress, help to sleep.
The acetic acid in vinegar can eliminate or relieve tension fatigue, help to sleep easily.
Walnut can relieve the mood, is suitable for cases caused by deficiency of sleep wake up late.
Eat dinner that are rich in protein, providing amino acids such as tryptophan, help to sleep.
Adequate calcium and magnesium supplements, these minerals can not only strengthen bones, also can make sleep better.
Three hours before sleeping, do not take medicine or food. Drug and food are sobering, difficult to fall asleep.
Grapes contain melatonin can help sleep, melatonin is secreted by pineal gland in the brain a substance that helps the body to sleep quickly.
Bread or pasta and a high-glycemic foods will make drastic fluctuations that affect blood sugar levels will have to sleep. So it is best not to eat these food before sleep.
